content: worked in a range of delicate shades and with a touch of sparkle at the edges these elegant coasters turn an afternoon tea break into a glamorous occasion **yarn ** 40 m / 45 yds of lace weight yarn shown in rico essentials crochet cotton 100% mercerised cotton 280 m / 306 yds per 50g colours shown 023 mint 025 gold 014 powder **hook ** 1 75mm **notions ** 32 beads shown using size 8 toho seed beads tapestry needle thin enough to thread chosen beads onto yarn **gauge ** first 4 rounds to measure 4 5 cm / 1¾in diameter **finished measurements ** 11 5 cm / 4½in diameter the pattern is also easily adapted to make larger matching placemats
